dict.acceptation: 百年，一世纪；百个；（板球）一百分；<美>百元钞票；

sent.orig: The 21 century is a century that's full of competition, but also a collaborative century.
sent.trans: 21世纪是充满竞争的世纪，又是协同合作的世纪。

sent.orig: Collection:19th-century perfumes, 20-century perfumes, 20th-century Cuban perfumes and toiletry.
sent.trans: 收藏19、20世纪香水、20世纪古巴香水和化妆品。

sent.orig: Hitler the 20th century century hegemony the man of the world around.
sent.trans: 希特勒，20世纪的世纪霸主，驰骋天下的风云人物。

sent.orig: The 21st century looms as the century of the Asia Pacific.
sent.trans: 二十一世纪的活力机体在本世纪的亚洲及太平洋地区。

sent.orig: Between the 5th century and the 10th century, the authority of Roman law collapsed completely.
sent.trans: 自公元5世纪到公元10世纪的时间里，罗马法的权威完全失落了。
